description: This PHP source file handles the second step of a web-based local network and Wi-Fi configuration wizard. It includes HTML, JavaScript, and PHP code to display a form for configuring Wi-Fi SSIDs, security modes, and passwords for both 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz bands, along with client-side validation and dynamic behavior. It also reads current Wi-Fi settings from backend variables and provides functionalities to save new configurations.

methods.name: set_config
methods.description: Sends the Wi-Fi configuration JSON to the server via AJAX and handles success or error responses, including alerting the user and redirecting.

methods.name: click_save
methods.description: Collects form data, constructs a JSON configuration object, and calls set_config() to save Wi-Fi settings.
